constituent: damage, finger, fingers, employee, mouth, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Boss yells, "Who damaged the Xerox machine?!" fingers of employees point at one another.
koohiiStory2: If you finger your employee, you risk incurring many damages from a possible sexual harassment lawsuit.
kunYomi: そこ.なう、そこな.う、-そこ.なう、そこ.ねる、-そこ.ねる
myStory: làm hư. hỏng. tay công nhân làm hư hỏng
readingExamples: 損なう (そこ.なう), 損ねる (そこ.ねる)
words: to harm, to hurt, to injure, to damage, to fail in doing
loss and gain, advantage and disadvantage
